td.content: s:59 yo white female presents with moderate nausea since hitting the back of the head a short time ago. she also reports severe headache, mild vomiting, Traumatic Injury - Blunt associated with the moderate nausea. she had LOC 41 min. o:Height 59 in, Weight 103 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15, CT Head (-) WNL w/ no acute findings suggestive of ICB, MRI Brain Unremarkable, appears in NAD, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Chest = normal breathing sounds B/L, Neuro: WNL, Eyes = normal pupillary reflex a:TBI (concussion) p:administered Flexeril - 10 mg po q 8 hrs PRN pain/cramps, performed CT Head, MRI Brain, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed, and ordered rest, and referred patient to family practice/primary care.

content2.Unmatched: , CT Head ( - ) WNL w/ no acute findings suggestive

Value.Value: CT Head , MRI Brain , and performed E/MALE Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed ,

content2.Value: CT Head , MRI Brain , and performed E/MALE Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed ,

td.content: s:59 YO f dock worker presents for approx. one (1) week f/u after sustaining a mild concussion (LOC 41 min). she denies headache, nausea and vomiting since the accident. Furthermore, she has had no subsequent loss of consciousness (LOC). she has resumed usual state of function. o:Height 60 in, Weight 105 lbs, Temperature 99.2 F, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17, ImPACT test Verbal Memory=96,Visual Memory=95,Processing Speed=44,Reaction Time=0.48, HEENT: NCAT, PERRL, Neck: Supple, C/V: RRR, Pulm: CTAB. Good effort, Abd: Scaphoid, soft, ND, NTTP. BS WNL, MS: Extremities x 4 WNL. Strength 5/5, equal bilaterally, Neuro: CN II-XII WNL. No deficits, Eyes = normal pupillary reflex a:S/P Concussion (with loss of consciousness from 31 to 59 minutes). No sequelae p:performed ImPACT test, and performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed.

Term.SOAP_SECTION: head, eyes, ears, nose, throat Examination

content2.Unmatched: No deficits , Eyes = normal pupillary reflex

td.content: Do not IV Fluid and Support
